questions.question_text_1: In a J-K flipflop, when J = 1 and K = 1, it toggles the flipflop’s state.
question_texts: In a J-K flipflop, when J = 1 and K = 1, it toggles the flipflop’s state.

questions.question_text_1: A multiplexer is a digital circuit that selects one of the several input signals and forwards it to a single output line.
question_texts: A multiplexer is a digital circuit that selects one of the several input signals and forwards it to a single output line.

questions.question_text_1: In a positive-edge-triggered D flipflop, if the D input is 1 and the clock signal transitions from low to high, Q output is 0.
question_texts: In a positive-edge-triggered D flipflop, if the D input is 1 and the clock signal transitions from low to high, Q output is 0.

questions.question_text_1: Sequential circuits do not utilize feedback loops, while combinational circuits do.
question_texts: Sequential circuits do not utilize feedback loops, while combinational circuits do.
